game.name: Aurora's Awakening
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In a mysterious castle, sorceress Aurora has been asleep for centuries. Able to summon powerful Elementals to fight by her side, Ever must protect the fortress from monsters and its most‑sought‑after secret while trying to discover who was responsible for Aurora’s slumber and find a way to wake her.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a mysterious castle, sorceress Aurora has been asleep for centuries. Able to summon powerful Elementals to fight by her side, Ever must protect the fortress from monsters and its most‑sought‑after secret while trying to discover who was responsible for Aurora’s slumber and find a way to wake her.
